description:
Higemaru Touma is a Rank 3 http://anidb.net/t7112 [Ghoul Investigator] and one of the second batch of recruits to the http://anidb.net/ch98963 [Quinx Squad]. He comes from a wealthy family, involved in various life-saving duties such as emergency responds and the Self-Defense Force.
Source: Tokyo Ghoul Wiki
name: Higemaru Touma
